title: Windows Server 2012 R2 with Update (x64) SVF Patches
description:
Windows Server 2012 R2 with Update (x64) SVF Patches

This set of patches converts the MSDN iso file:
en_windows_server_2012_r2_with_update_x64_dvd_4065220.iso

to one of the three following MSDN files:
en_windows_server_2012_r2_vl_with_update_x64_dvd_4065221.iso
en_windows_storage_server_2012_r2_and_windows_server_2012_r2_foundation_with_update_x64_dvd_4119206.iso
en_windows_server_2012_r2_essentials_with_update_x64_dvd_4119207.iso

You can check the resulting file hashes with MSDN: <a href="
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/subscriptions/downloads/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/subscriptions/downloads/</a>

Instructions:
1) Install smartversion 3
2) Extract the 7zip file to same directory as the 4065220 iso
3) Double click the desired patch file for the convert-to version
4) Wait a minute for the patch to load in smartversion
5) Click the extract version button (books with down arrow)
6) Select a destination location and click OK.

It's so simple, a baby could do it.

Enjoy,
murph
